name: Adult Programs
description: At Light House, we’re dedicated to enriching adult lives through a variety of programs tailored to meet diverse interests and needs. Our offerings are more than just activities; they’re gateways to independence, community, equity, and joy. Monthly Adult Programs Guide: - The Arts & Entertainment: Immerse in culture with museum visits and audio described and haptic live theater experiences. - Unleash creativity in arts and crafts sessions.
